title: Season 8
body:
why is yasuo, zed and katarina literally perma banned in low elo?

these are all champs i play alot but i cant even play 1 of them because even if i put one these as my option to play in ranked my team still bans it :( feels bad man

replies.body: I know that feeling all too well having been a teemo main for a long time! It really sucks knowing people ban your favorite champions rather often, but just do your best to let them know who you're intending to play early on so they don't instalock. Overall, everyone is still entitled to their ban choices =\
